data.name: Sleeping Dogs: Ghost Pig
data.detailed_description: Become the elusive movie star with the Ghost Pig mask. Dogeyes’ black fedora hat, an assassin’s straw hat, and a lone sheriff’s hat are also included in this free pack.
data.about_the_game: Become the elusive movie star with the Ghost Pig mask. Dogeyes’ black fedora hat, an assassin’s straw hat, and a lone sheriff’s hat are also included in this free pack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows Vista Service Pack 2, Windows 7
  • Processor:Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 or 11 compatible Nvidia or AMD ATI card, ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher
  • DirectX®:10
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor:Quad-core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 11 Nvidia or AMD ATI card, Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or ATI Radeon 6950
  • DirectX®:11
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
